column3: Latest;Stung Treng Province: The Royal Gendarmerie of Stung Treng Province arrested a man with a large quantity of yama tablets at  3:20 pm on March 7
column5: on  Vorn Kham Boulevard in Khum Phat Village
column11: Lao PDR.------A source from the Royal Gendarmerie of Stung Treng province said that the  the suspect crossed the border from Laos and traded the drugs in Stung Treng
